text: Stefano Angioni (born 18 November 1939) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Cagliari
title: Stefano Angioni
